text: Trump gave pardons to hundreds of violent Jan. 6 rioters.  Here's what they did  —  Loading...  Throughout his 2024 campaign for president, Donald Trump repeatedly promised to give pardons to his supporters who had been criminally charged in the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol.
